Message:
And so, I set foot on my journey
to search for the “Successor.”

Soon after that,
the “Curses” engulfed the world.

As I wander from
one country to the next,
all the worries I had
bottled up begin crawling
back into my mind.

If I don’t find the Successor,
the world will truly
be destroyed.

The fate of the world
depends on me...

Her Holiness told me
not to worry,

but even if I searched
every corner of the world,
that doesn’t mean I can meet
every single person out there.

I don’t even know
what kind of person
the “Successor” is
to begin with...

What if I was
unable to meet them?
What if I did, but didn’t know?

they’ve already fallen
victim to the Curses...?

Because this time...
This time, I will protect
everyone with my own
two hands...!

If I don’t, then what
would be the point of
everything I’ve done
until now...?
the only one who can do this...
